## coerce variable

Coerce builder content into tagged nodes.

Checks if the content item is a string and runs the text transformer otherwise passes a flattened structure through to the `sequence` function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
coerce: ({ content, schema }: CoerceParams) => {
    nodes: TaggedProsemirrorNode[];
    tags: Tags;
}
```
